snippet.title: Apparently This Matters: Virtual soda drinking
snippet.description:
* I haven't had a single Diet Coke in 2014. It was a conscious health decision, and the only real side effect, now, is that the world is awful and I hate everything.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/18/tech/social-media/apparently-this-matters-soda-drinker-pro/index.html

snippet.title: Review: 'The Other Woman'
snippet.description:
* When Cameron Diaz, a type-A corporate attorney ? you know this because she wears power skirts and taps officiously on a laptop in a skybox office the size of a swimming pool ? gets swept off her feet by a dashing businessman ("Game of Thrones'" Nikolaj Coster-Waldau), it all seems too good to be true. Because of course, i...
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/25/showbiz/movies/the-other-woman-review-ew/index.html

snippet.title: Review: 'Bookworm Adventures' wordsmith's joy
snippet.description:
* With such celebrated puzzlers as "Bejeweled," "Zuma," "Inasaniquarium," "Chuzzle" and "Feeding Frenzy 2," PopCap Games has more than earned its reputation as a trusted PC games publisher.
http://www.cnn.com/2006/TECH/fun.games/12/22/bookworm.deluxe/index.html

snippet.title: Third 'Divergent' film to be split in two
snippet.description:
* Welcome to the new normal for movie franchises. As was done with prior popular series, the final installment of the "Divergent" movies will be split into two, Lionsgate announced on Friday. Adapted from the best-selling young adult novels by Veronica...
http://marquee.blogs.cnn.com/2014/04/11/third-divergent-film-to-be-split-in-two/

snippet.title: Review: Good performance and price from HP's media desktop
snippet.description:
* The HP Pavilion Media Center TV m8120n is proof positive that quad-core processing is ready for mass consumption. This $1,150 entertainment-minded desktop serves up Intel's Core 2 Quad Q6600 CPU, a quad-core chip that up to this point we've seen only in much higher-end systems meant for gaming.
http://www.cnn.com/2007/TECH/ptech/07/17/hp.pavilion.mc/index.html

snippet.title: It's a mad, mad, mad, 'Mad Men' world
snippet.description:
* A funny thing happened to "Mad Men" on its way to its seventh season.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/11/showbiz/tv/mad-men-season-7-preview-impact/index.html

snippet.title: Review: 'Tribes 2' a solid sequel with some flaws
snippet.description:
* "Starsiege: Tribes" took the Internet by storm when it was released back in 1999, and now, finally, "Tribes 2" has hit the PC with a bang. This highly anticipated sequel is sure to please hardcore "Tribes" fans, with a slew of new features and tweaks, however, there are a few caveats, especially...
http://www.cnn.com/2001/TECH/fun.games/04/09/tribes.2.idg/index.html

snippet.title: Review: Velocity Micro offers up complete home theater PC
snippet.description:
* The CineMagix Grand Theater represents Velocity Micro's first foray into the realm of the all-out home theater PC.
http://www.cnn.com/2007/TECH/ptech/02/22/velocity.grand.theater/index.html

snippet.title: Review: Rewrite history with PC sequels
snippet.description:
* Why merely read about history when you can change it? Two new strategy game sequels for the PC let you flex your military, economic or diplomatic muscle by taking control of a civilization and its resources.
http://www.cnn.com/2005/TECH/fun.games/05/23/pc.sequels/index.html
